meanings.definition: The act of recording moving images on film or video.
meanings.sent1: During the filming of the school play, the camera captured all the action.
meanings.sent2: The filming of the documentary took place in various locations around the world.
meanings.sent3: While filming the birthday party, the camera accidentally caught a funny moment.
meanings.sent4: The filming of the wildlife in its natural habitat was like capturing a piece of magic.
meanings.sent5: The filming of the sunset painted a beautiful picture on the screen.

meanings.definition: The process of making a movie or television show.
meanings.sent1: The filming of the action movie involved many exciting stunts.
meanings.sent2: In Hollywood, the filming of a blockbuster can take months to complete.
meanings.sent3: The filming of the comedy series had everyone on set laughing all day.
meanings.sent4: The filming of the thriller was a rollercoaster of suspense and surprises.
meanings.sent5: The filming of the romantic movie captured the essence of love on screen.

meanings.definition: The activity of capturing images with a camera.
meanings.sent1: Her hobby of filming nature led to stunning photographs of wildlife.
meanings.sent2: The filming of the family vacation created lasting memories for everyone.
meanings.sent3: While filming the wedding, the photographer caught a candid moment between the couple.
meanings.sent4: The filming of the cityscape at night revealed a mesmerizing display of lights.
meanings.sent5: The filming of the baby's first steps was a precious moment captured forever.
